channel.title: Is this too abrupt of a drop?
channel.description: So on a new song im working on, I was Ted to experiment with different types of drops, here I have one showcased, I want to make the buildup suttle, but not **_<big>Boom_**, here’s the drop. So I’ve cut the snippet out for you to examine. https://app.auxy.co/projects/qPuNU8ZGJuadYI20affa8g==. And you decide if this is too abrupt of a drop or not.

item.title: Is this too abrupt of a drop?
item.dc:creator: HYDRANS
item.description:
No, but I would suggest changing the 2nd chord of the progression

Read full topic
item.source: Is this too abrupt of a drop?

item.description:
I haven’t even looked at the project, but I know that this is the right advice.

item.title: Is this too abrupt of a drop?
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
not really imo, but maybe try adding toms in the last bar of the buildup for finality and add a secondary melody in the second 8 bars of the drop. that’s the advice I’d give you

Read full topic
item.source: Is this too abrupt of a drop?
